summary: Provides an advanced asynchronous stream reader that extends the standard asyncio.StreamReader, enabling seamless async iteration over lines, fixed-size chunks, or any available data slices while managing internal buffers, EOF handling, and exception propagation.
business_intent: Facilitate robust, non‑blocking consumption of streaming data in networked or I/O‑bound applications, allowing developers to process incoming data incrementally (by line, chunk, or as‑available) without manual buffer management.
